{{Big Brother endgame | hmpage = Housemates | seriesname = Big Brother Brasil | previous = Big Brother Brasil 4 | next = Big Brother Brasil 6 | series = Season 5 (2005) | image = | imagebg = #000 | start = January 10, 2005 | end = March 29, 2005 | hm1 = Jean | hm1-enter = Day 1 | hm1-exit = Day 79 | hm1-stat = winner | hm2 = Grazielli | hm2-enter = Day 1 | hm2-exit = Day 79 | hm2-stat = runner | hm3 = Sammy | hm3-enter = Day 1 | hm3-exit = Day 79 | hm3-stat = evic | hm4 = Alan | hm4-enter = Day 1 | hm4-exit = Day 77 | hm4-stat = evic | hm5 = Tati Pink | hm5-enter = Day 1 | hm5-exit = Day 72 | hm5-stat = five | hm6 = Karla | hm6-enter = Day 1 | hm6-exit = Day 65 | hm6-stat = evic | hm7 = Aline | hm7-enter = Day 14 | hm7-exit = Day 58 | hm7-stat = evic | hm8 = Tatiana | hm8-enter = Day 1 | hm8-exit = Day 51 | hm8-stat = evic | hm9 = NatÃ¡lia | hm9-enter = Day 1 | hm9-exit = Day 44 | hm9-stat = evic | hm10 = Paulo | hm10-enter = Day 1 | hm10-exit = Day 37 | hm10-stat = evic | hm11 = RogÃ©rio | hm11-enter = Day 1 | hm11-exit = Day 30 | hm11-stat = evic | hm12 = Giulliano | hm12-enter = Day 1 | hm12-exit = Day 23 | hm12-stat = evic | hm13 = Marcos | hm13-enter = Day 4 | hm13-exit = Day 16 | hm13-stat = evic | hm14 = Marielza | hm14-enter = Day 4 | hm14-exit = Day 13 | hm14-stat = walk | hm15 = Juliana | hm15-enter = Day 1 | hm15-exit = Day 9 | hm15-stat = evic | legendwinner = Winner | legendrunner = Runner Up | legendevic = Evicted | legendwalk = Walked | legend5 = Big Boss Winner }} '''''Big Brother Brasil 5''''' was the fifth season of '''''Big Brother Brasil''''' which premiered January 10, 2005 with the season finale airing March 29, 2005 on the [[Rede Globo]] [[television network]]. The show was produced by [[Endemol|Endemol Globo]] and presented by news reporter [[Pedro Bial]] and directed by Jose Bonifacio Brasil de Oliveira. The prize award was R$1,000,000 without tax allowances. The winner was 30 year-old college professor Jean Wyllys from [[Alagoinhas]], [[Bahia]]. He was the first housemate to declare himself gay during the show. ==General== There were fourteen housemates competing for the grand prize. The season lasted 79 days, a decrease of almost one week over the previous season. The season introduced the Z$ '''Estaleca''' (currency of the house). For the first time since the [[Big Brother Brasil 1|first season]], the Finale Night featured a Final Three rather than a Final Two. Aline Cristina is the currently tied with Big Brother Spain 11's Nagore for the highest eviction percentage in the world, 95%. ===Reunion Show=== The reunion was hosted by [[Pedro Bial]] and aired on April 3, 2005. All the housemates, except Marielza, attended. Tati Pink ended up winning the "Big Boss Prize" which awarded a new [[Fiat Stilo]]. She won over Marcos with 76% of the fans' vote.[http://bbb.globo.com/BBB5/0,24118,NBO941116-4051,00.html Pink ganha o carro 0km] This was the last season that air a reunion. ===After the Show=== [[Grazielli Massafera]] became a very popular celebrity and starred in a 2006 [[Rede Globo]]'s prime-time [[soap opera]] entitled "PÃ¡ginas da Vida". She also starred another soap-operas like "Desejo Proibido", "NegÃ³cio da China" (protagonist) and "Tempos Modernos" (main antagonist). ==Housemates== (ages stated at time of contest) {| class="wikitable" |- ! The Head of Household vote (casted in front of the other housemates) automatically nominate one housemate from eviction. Then, the other housemates voting and if the vote is tied, the HOH breaks the tie (all this types of vote count for the total number of nominations received). {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width: 99%; font-size:87%; line-height:15px;" |- ! rowspan=2| ! rowspan=2| Week 1 ! rowspan=2| Week 2 ! rowspan=2| Week 3 ! rowspan=2| Week 4 ! rowspan=2| Week 5 ! rowspan=2| Week 6 ! rowspan=2| Week 7 ! rowspan=2| Week 8 ! rowspan=2| Week 9 ! rowspan=2| Week 10 ! colspan=3| Week 11 ! rowspan=2| Nominations

to win |} * [[#fn1|Note 1:]] Extra surprise Housemates Marcos and Marielza entered on Day 4 and the public had to vote for one of them to be [[Immunity (reality television)|immune]] from nomination that week. They chose Marielza with 54%. * [[#fn2|Note 2:]] Marielza had to leave the House after a health problem. * [[#fn3|Note 3:]] Sammy won the final Power of Immunity competition. However, there was a twist (not known by the housemates) in which the winner, rather than immunize another housemate, would be immunized. ==References== {{Reflist|2}} ==External links== ;Official * [http://bbb5.globo.com/ Big Brother Brasil 5] ;Other * [http://exclusivo.terra.com.br/bbb5/ Terra: BBB5] {{Big Brother Brasil}} [[Category:2005 television seasons]] [[Category:Big Brother Brasil]] [[Category:Big Brother seasons]] [[es:Big Brother (Brasil)]] [[pt:Big Brother Brasil]]
